        public java.lang.Integer getClassTotalCredits(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> classAL)
        getClassTotalCredits This takes in an ArrayList of type String of classes and returns the total credits of all classes combined. It just calls the getClassCredit method and sums up everything in an enhanced for loop.
